runes.name: Electrocute
runes.short_desc: Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities in 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.
runes.long_desc:
Hitting a champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities within 3s deals bonus adaptive damage.

Damage: 70 - 240 (+0.1 bonus AD, +0.05 AP) damage.
Cooldown: 20s

'We called them the Thunderlords, for to speak of their lightning was to invite disaster.'
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Damaging basic attacks , abilities , item effects , and summoner spells , as well as the application of crowd control and damage over time effects, generate stacks against enemy champions , up to one per attack or cast per champion. Applying 3 stacks to a target within a 3 second period causes them to be struck by lightning after a 0. 25 -second delay, dealing them 70 – 260 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) physical or magic damage.
If 「 10% bonus AD ≥ 5% AP , 」 「 bonus AD ≥ 50% AP , 」 deals physical damage . If otherwise, deals magic damage .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Damaging basic attacks , abilities , item effects , and summoner spells , as well as the application of crowd control and damage over time effects, generate stacks against enemy champions , up to one per attack or cast per champion. Applying 3 stacks to a target within a 3 second period causes them to be struck by lightning after a 0. 25 -second delay, dealing them 70 – 260 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) physical or magic damage.
If 「 10% bonus AD ≥ 5% AP , 」 「 bonus AD ≥ 50% AP , 」 deals physical damage . If otherwise, deals magic damage .

runes.name: Dark Harvest
runes.short_desc: Damaging a low health champion inflicts <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and harvests a soul from the victim.
runes.long_desc:
Damaging a Champion below 50% health deals adaptive damage and harvests their soul, permanently increasing Dark Harvest's damage by 11.

Dark Harvest damage: 30 (+11 damage per soul) (+0.1 bonus AD) (+0.05 AP)
Cooldown: 35s (resets to 1.0s on takedown)
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage against enemy champions below 50% of their maximum health deal 30 (+ 11 per Soul) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) bonus adaptive damage and, after a 1. 75 -second delay, reap 1 Soul . This cannot occur again for 35 seconds, resetting to 1 second upon scoring a takedown against an enemy champion.
While not on cooldown, also reap 1 Soul from receiving the kill credit of a champion killed by a minion , monster , or turret .

Adaptive Damage: This effect deals either physical or magic damage depending on the damage contribution from your attack damage and ability power to the effect's damage formula. Greater bonus damage from the AD ratio → Physical damage Greater bonus damage from the AP ratio → Magic damage If the damage contribution of AD and AP are zero or otherwise equal, the damage type depends on the effect's particular default.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage against enemy champions below 50% of their maximum health deal 30 (+ 11 per Soul) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) bonus adaptive damage and, after a 1. 75 -second delay, reap 1 Soul . This cannot occur again for 35 seconds, resetting to 1 second upon scoring a takedown against an enemy champion.
While not on cooldown, also reap 1 Soul from receiving the kill credit of a champion killed by a minion , monster , or turret .

Adaptive Damage: This effect deals either physical or magic damage depending on the damage contribution from your attack damage and ability power to the effect's damage formula. Greater bonus damage from the AD ratio → Physical damage Greater bonus damage from the AP ratio → Magic damage If the damage contribution of AD and AP are zero or otherwise equal, the damage type depends on the effect's particular default.

runes.name: Hail of Blades
runes.short_desc: Gain a large amount of Attack Speed for the first 3 attacks made against enemy champions.
runes.long_desc:
Gain 160% (80% for ranged champions) Attack Speed when you attack an enemy champion for up to 3 attacks.

No more than 3s can elapse between attacks or this effect will end.

Cooldown: 10s.

Attack resets increase the attack limit by 1.
Allows you to temporarily exceed the Attack Speed limit.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Starting an attack windup against an enemy champion triggers Hail of Blades , and if the windup completes, you gain 2 stacks of the effect for 3 seconds, with the duration refreshing on basic attacks on-attack against enemy champions until all stacks are consumed. Stacks are consumed per basic attack on-attack and you generate an additional stack of the effect each time your basic attack timer is reset .
While Hail of Blades is active, you gain ( 160% / 80% ) bonus attack speed and are allowed to exceed the attack speed cap . The triggering attack benefits from Hail of Blades.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Starting an attack windup against an enemy champion triggers Hail of Blades , and if the windup completes, you gain 2 stacks of the effect for 3 seconds, with the duration refreshing on basic attacks on-attack against enemy champions until all stacks are consumed. Stacks are consumed per basic attack on-attack and you generate an additional stack of the effect each time your basic attack timer is reset .
While Hail of Blades is active, you gain ( 160% / 80% ) bonus attack speed and are allowed to exceed the attack speed cap . The triggering attack benefits from Hail of Blades.

runes.name: Cheap Shot
runes.short_desc: Deal bonus true damage to enemy champions with <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairAct'>impaired movement or actions</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.long_desc:
Damaging champions with impaired movement or actions deals 10 - 45 bonus true damage (based on level).

Cooldown: 4s
Activates on damage occurring after the impairment.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage deal 10 – 49. 12 (based on level) bonus true damage to enemy champions affected by certain crowd control effects.
Valid Crowd Control: Immobilizes Blind Disarm Ground Nearsight Polymorph Silence Slow
The target must already be impaired prior to the damaging attack or spell in order to trigger the bonus damage.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Damaging basic attacks and ability damage deal 10 – 49. 12 (based on level) bonus true damage to enemy champions affected by certain crowd control effects.
Valid Crowd Control: Immobilizes Blind Disarm Ground Nearsight Polymorph Silence Slow
The target must already be impaired prior to the damaging attack or spell in order to trigger the bonus damage.

runes.name: Taste of Blood
runes.short_desc: Heal when you damage an enemy champion.
runes.long_desc:
Heal when you damage an enemy champion.

Healing: 16-40 (+0.1 bonus AD, +0.05 AP) health (based on level)

Cooldown: 20s
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Damaging an enemy champion heals you for 16 – 42. 82 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) .
Does not trigger at full health.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Damaging an enemy champion heals you for 16 – 42. 82 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) .
Does not trigger at full health.

runes.name: Sudden Impact
runes.short_desc: Damaging basic attacks and abilities deal bonus true damage to enemy champions after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth.
runes.long_desc:
Damaging basic attacks and abilities deal a bonus 20 - 80 True Damage based on level to enemy champions after using a dash, leap, blink, teleport, or when leaving stealth for 4s.

Cooldown: 10s
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Dealing damage to an enemy champion within 4 seconds of using a dash or blink , or exiting from stealth , deals 20 – 80 (based on level) bonus true damage to them.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Dealing damage to an enemy champion within 4 seconds of using a dash or blink , or exiting from stealth , deals 20 – 80 (based on level) bonus true damage to them.

runes.name: Sixth Sense
runes.short_desc:
On a long Cooldown, automatically sense a nearby untracked and unseen ward, tracking it for the team.

Level 11: Also reveal the ward for 10s.
runes.long_desc:
Automatically sense a nearby untracked and unseen ward, tracking it for the team.

Level 11: Also reveal the ward for 10s.

This effect has a 250 second Cooldown.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Upon moving near an un-tracked enemy ward , it is automatically tracked with a ward timer .
At level 11, additionally reveals nearby enemy stealthed wards for 10 seconds upon being triggered.

effects_structured.raw: Upon moving near an un-tracked enemy ward, it is automatically tracked with a ward timer.
At level 11, additionally reveals nearby enemy stealthed wards for 10 seconds upon being triggered.

runes.name: Grisly Mementos
runes.short_desc:
Collect 1 memento on champion takedowns, up to 18 total.

Gain 6 Trinket Haste for each collected.
runes.long_desc:
Collect 1 memento on champion takedowns, up to 18 total.

Gain 6 Trinket Haste for each collected. In game modes where vision Trinkets do not exist, instead gain 3 Summoner Spell Haste.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain 6 trinket haste per Memento stack, up to 108 haste at maximum stacks.
Earn a Memento stack whenever scoring a champion takedown , up to 18 stacks.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Gain 6 trinket haste per Memento stack, up to 108 haste at maximum stacks.
Earn a Memento stack whenever scoring a champion takedown , up to 18 stacks.

runes.name: Deep Ward
runes.short_desc:
Your wards in the enemy jungle are Deep, gaining Health and Duration.

Level 9: Wards in the river are also Deep.
runes.long_desc:
Your wards in the enemy jungle are Deep. Deep wards gain +1 extra Health and +[30 - 45]s increased duration (+[45 - 150]s for Trinket stealth wards).

Level 9: Wards in the river are also Deep.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Stealth Wards and Totem Wards placed in the enemy jungle are considered Deep . All Deep wards are granted 1 bonus health , Deep Stealth Wards last 30 – 45 (based on average champion level) seconds longer, and Deep Totem Wards last 45 – 150 (based on average champion level) seconds longer.
At level 9, wards placed in the river will also be considered Deep .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Stealth Wards and Totem Wards placed in the enemy jungle are considered Deep . All Deep wards are granted 1 bonus health , Deep Stealth Wards last 30 – 45 (based on average champion level) seconds longer, and Deep Totem Wards last 45 – 150 (based on average champion level) seconds longer.
At level 9, wards placed in the river will also be considered Deep .

runes.name: Treasure Hunter
runes.short_desc: Unique takedowns grant additional gold the first time they are collected.
runes.long_desc:
Gain an additional 50 gold the next time you collect a Bounty Hunter stack. Increase the gold gained by 20 gold for each Bounty Hunter stack, up to 130 gold.

Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
wiki_descriptions: Gain 50 (+ 20 per Bounty Hunter stack) per unique takedown, up to 450 at 5 unique takedowns.
1st unique takedown: 50 , 2nd: 70 , 3rd: 90 , 4th: 110 , 5th: 130 .
Earn a Bounty Hunter stack whenever scoring a takedown against an enemy champion, up to one per unique champion.

effects_structured.raw: Gain 50 (+ 20 per Bounty Hunter stack) per unique takedown, up to 450 at 5 unique takedowns.
1st unique takedown: 50 , 2nd: 70 , 3rd: 90 , 4th: 110 , 5th: 130 .
Earn a Bounty Hunter stack whenever scoring a takedown against an enemy champion, up to one per unique champion.

runes.name: Relentless Hunter
runes.short_desc: Unique takedowns grant permanent out of combat MS.
runes.long_desc: Gain 8 Move Speed out of combat per Bounty Hunter stack. Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain 8 bonus movement speed while out of combat per Bounty Hunter stack, up to 40 at 5 stacks.
Earn a Bounty Hunter stack whenever scoring a takedown against an enemy champion, up to one per unique champion.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Gain 8 bonus movement speed while out of combat per Bounty Hunter stack, up to 40 at 5 stacks.
Earn a Bounty Hunter stack whenever scoring a takedown against an enemy champion, up to one per unique champion.

runes.name: Ultimate Hunter
runes.short_desc: Unique takedowns grant permanent cooldown reduction on your Ultimate.
runes.long_desc: Your ultimate gains 6 Ability Haste, plus an additional 5 Ability Haste per Bounty Hunter stack. Bounty Hunter stacks are earned the first time you get a takedown on each enemy champion.
wiki_descriptions: Gain 6 (+ 5 per Bounty Hunter stack ) ultimate haste , up to 31 at 5 stacks.
Earn a Bounty Hunter stack whenever scoring a takedown against an enemy champion , up to one per unique champion.

effects_structured.raw: Gain 6 (+ 5 per Bounty Hunter stack ) ultimate haste , up to 31 at 5 stacks.
Earn a Bounty Hunter stack whenever scoring a takedown against an enemy champion , up to one per unique champion.

runes.name: Glacial Augment
runes.short_desc: Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays that slow nearby enemies and reduce their damage to your allies.
runes.long_desc:
Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays to emanate from them towards you and other nearby champions, creating frozen zones for 3 (+ the immobilizing effect's duration) seconds that slow enemies for 20% (+90% per 100% Heal and Shield Power) (+6% per 100 Ability Power) (+7% per 100 bonus Attack Damage) and reduce their damage by 15% against your allies (not including yourself).

Cooldown: 25s
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays to emanate from them towards you and other nearby enemy champions, creating icy zones with a 700 unit radius that last for 3 (+ 100% of the immobilizing effect's duration ) seconds.

Enemies within the icy zones, which have a width of 80 units, are slowed by 20% (+ 7% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 6% per 100 AP) (+ 9% per 10% heal and shield power) and have their damage reduced by 15% against your allies, excluding yourself.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Immobilizing an enemy champion will cause 3 glacial rays to emanate from them towards you and other nearby enemy champions, creating icy zones with a 700 unit radius that last for 3 (+ 100% of the immobilizing effect's duration ) seconds.

Enemies within the icy zones, which have a width of 80 units, are slowed by 20% (+ 7% per 100 bonus AD) (+ 6% per 100 AP) (+ 9% per 10% heal and shield power) and have their damage reduced by 15% against your allies, excluding yourself.

runes.name: Unsealed Spellbook
runes.short_desc: Swap Summoner Spells while out of combat. Swapping to unique Summoner Spells will increase the rate at which you can make future swaps.
runes.long_desc:
Swap one of your equipped Summoner Spells to a new, single use Summoner Spell. Each unique Summoner Spell you swap to permanently decreases your swap cooldown by 25s (initial swap cooldown is @f3@ seconds).

Your first swap becomes available at 6 mins.

Summoner Spells can only be swapped while out of combat.
After using a swapped Summoner Spell you must swap 3 more times before the first can be selected again.
Smite damage increases after two Summoner Spell swaps.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: While not channeling Teleport and being out-of-combat for 5 seconds, you can swap one of your equipped summoner spells to a new, single use summoner spell. You cannot select a summoner spell you have already equipped.

Your first swap becomes available at 6:00 . Swaps have an initial cooldown of 270 seconds; selecting a unique summoner spell reduces the swap cooldown by 25 seconds. You must swap to 3 different summoner spells before returning to one you have already used.
Selecting a summoner spell places it on a 5-second cooldown. Using a selected summoner spell places the summoner spell in the same slot on a 10-second cooldown.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: While not channeling Teleport and being out-of-combat for 5 seconds, you can swap one of your equipped summoner spells to a new, single use summoner spell. You cannot select a summoner spell you have already equipped.

Your first swap becomes available at 6:00 . Swaps have an initial cooldown of 270 seconds; selecting a unique summoner spell reduces the swap cooldown by 25 seconds. You must swap to 3 different summoner spells before returning to one you have already used.
Selecting a summoner spell places it on a 5-second cooldown. Using a selected summoner spell places the summoner spell in the same slot on a 10-second cooldown.

runes.name: First Strike
runes.short_desc: When you initiate champion combat, deal 7% extra damage for 3 seconds and gain gold based on damage dealt.
runes.long_desc:
Attacks or abilities against an enemy champion within 0.25s of entering champion combat grant 10 gold and First Strike for 3 seconds, causing you to deal 7% extra damage against champions, and granting 50% (35% for ranged champions) of bonus damage dealt as gold.

Cooldown: 25 - 15s
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Initiating combat with an enemy champion within the first 0. 25 seconds of champion combat grants 10 and First Strike for 3 seconds, causing all of your post-mitigation damage dealt against champions to deal 7% bonus true damage . Afterwards, you are granted gold equal to ( 50% / 35% ) of all bonus damage dealt within the duration.
First Strike will be placed on full cooldown without activating its effects after being struck by an enemy champion before you strike them.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Initiating combat with an enemy champion within the first 0. 25 seconds of champion combat grants 10 and First Strike for 3 seconds, causing all of your post-mitigation damage dealt against champions to deal 7% bonus true damage . Afterwards, you are granted gold equal to ( 50% / 35% ) of all bonus damage dealt within the duration.
First Strike will be placed on full cooldown without activating its effects after being struck by an enemy champion before you strike them.

runes.name: Hextech Flashtraption
runes.short_desc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel, then blink to a new location.
runes.long_desc:
While Flash is on cooldown it is replaced by Hexflash.

Hexflash: Channel for 2s to blink to a new location.

Cooldown: 20s. Goes on a 10s cooldown when you enter champion combat.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: While Flash has a remaining cooldown greater than 2 seconds, it is replaced by Hexflash .

Active: You begin charging for up to 2. 5 seconds, setting your movement speed to 0 , and increasing Hexflash's range over the duration. After at least 1 second, you can reactivate the spell, which is automatically done so when the charge completes without reactivation. Releasing the charge earlier than 1 second or entering combat with an enemy champion will put Hexflash on cooldown for 10 seconds.
Recast: You blink to the target location within range and gain 50% bonus movement speed for up to 0. 25 seconds.
Uses Quick Casting by default, which requires the Active to be held and the Recast to occur on release.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: While Flash has a remaining cooldown greater than 2 seconds, it is replaced by Hexflash .

Active: You begin charging for up to 2. 5 seconds, setting your movement speed to 0 , and increasing Hexflash's range over the duration. After at least 1 second, you can reactivate the spell, which is automatically done so when the charge completes without reactivation. Releasing the charge earlier than 1 second or entering combat with an enemy champion will put Hexflash on cooldown for 10 seconds.
Recast: You blink to the target location within range and gain 50% bonus movement speed for up to 0. 25 seconds.
Uses Quick Casting by default, which requires the Active to be held and the Recast to occur on release.

runes.name: Magical Footwear
runes.short_desc: You get free boots at 12 min but you cannot buy boots before then. Each <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>takedown</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> you get makes your boots come 45s sooner.
runes.long_desc:
You get free Slightly Magical Footwear at 12 min, but you cannot buy boots before then. For each takedown you acquire the boots 45s sooner.

Slightly Magical Footwear grants you an additional 10 Move Speed.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: After 12 minutes (reduced by 45 seconds whenever scoring a takedown against an enemy champion), you gain Slightly Magical Boots for free . Slightly Magical Boots are identical to Boots and can be upgraded as if it were the item. If the inventory is full while receiving the boots, they will appear as soon as a slot in the inventory is available.
Additionally, your boots grant an additional 10 bonus movement speed .
You cannot purchase Boots nor any Tier-2 boots prior to obtaining Slightly Magical Boots .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: After 12 minutes (reduced by 45 seconds whenever scoring a takedown against an enemy champion), you gain Slightly Magical Boots for free . Slightly Magical Boots are identical to Boots and can be upgraded as if it were the item. If the inventory is full while receiving the boots, they will appear as soon as a slot in the inventory is available.
Additionally, your boots grant an additional 10 bonus movement speed .
You cannot purchase Boots nor any Tier-2 boots prior to obtaining Slightly Magical Boots .

runes.name: Cash Back
runes.short_desc: Get some gold back when you purchase Legendary Items.
runes.long_desc: Get 7.5% Gold back when you purchase Legendary Items.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Upon purchasing a Legendary item , you are automatically refunded 7. 5 % of its total gold cost.
Selling or undoing the item's purchase will cancel the refund, reducing your current gold equal to the refunded amount.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Upon purchasing a Legendary item , you are automatically refunded 7. 5 % of its total gold cost.
Selling or undoing the item's purchase will cancel the refund, reducing your current gold equal to the refunded amount.

runes.name: Triple Tonic
runes.short_desc:
Upon reaching level 3, gain an Elixir of Avarice.
Upon reaching level 6, gain an Elixir of Force.
Upon reaching level 9, gain an Elixir of Skill.
runes.long_desc:
Upon reaching level 3, gain an Elixir of Avarice.
Upon reaching level 6, gain an Elixir of Force.
Upon reaching level 9, gain an Elixir of Skill.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain an Elixir upon reaching each of the following levels: Level 3: Elixir of Avarice Level 6: Elixir of Force Level 9: Elixir of Skill

If the inventory is full upon the user becoming eligible to receive Elixir of Avarice or Elixir of Force , each item will be granted as soon as an empty slot is available. If the inventory is full upon becoming eligible to receive Elixir of Skill , the item is consumed automatically.

effects_structured.raw: Level 3: Gain Elixir of Avarice.
Level 6: Gain Elixir of Force.
Level 9: Gain Elixir of Skill.
If inventory is full while receiving an elixir, it appears when a slot is available.

runes.name: Time Warp Tonic
runes.short_desc: Potions grant some restoration immediately.
runes.long_desc: Consuming a potion grants 40% of its health restoration immediately.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Upon consuming a potion ( ), you additionally heal equal to 40% of its total health restoration.
If a health potion is consumed while one is already active, this effect will trigger on the activation of the next potion once the restoration of the current one ends.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Upon consuming a potion ( ), you additionally heal equal to 40% of its total health restoration.
If a health potion is consumed while one is already active, this effect will trigger on the activation of the next potion once the restoration of the current one ends.

runes.name: Biscuit Delivery
runes.short_desc: Gain a free Biscuit every 2 min, until 6 min. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max health and restores health.
runes.long_desc:
Biscuit Delivery: Gain a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will every 2 mins, until 6 min.

Biscuits restore 20 + 2% of your maximum health, increased by up to 100% based on missing Health. Consuming or selling a Biscuit permanently increases your max health by 30.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Receive a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will at 2:00 , 4:00 , and 6:00 . If the inventory is full while receiving a biscuit, the biscuit(s) will appear as soon as a slot in the inventory is available.
Consuming a Biscuit will permanently increase your maximum health by 30 , in addition to its effects. You will also gain the increased health if you sell the biscuit for 5 .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Receive a Total Biscuit of Everlasting Will at 2:00 , 4:00 , and 6:00 . If the inventory is full while receiving a biscuit, the biscuit(s) will appear as soon as a slot in the inventory is available.
Consuming a Biscuit will permanently increase your maximum health by 30 , in addition to its effects. You will also gain the increased health if you sell the biscuit for 5 .

runes.name: Cosmic Insight
runes.short_desc:
+18 Summoner Spell Haste
+10 Item Haste
runes.long_desc:
+18 Summoner Spell Haste
+10 Item Haste
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain 18 summoner spell haste and 10 item haste .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Gain 18 summoner spell haste and 10 item haste .

runes.name: Approach Velocity
runes.short_desc: Bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> towards nearby enemy champions that are <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>movement impaired</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>, increased for enemy champions that you impair.
runes.long_desc:
Gain 7.5% Move Speed towards nearby enemy champions that are movement impaired. This bonus is increased to 15% Move Speed for any enemy champion that you impair.

Activation Range for CC from allies: 1000
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain 7. 5 % bonus total movement speed while facing visible enemy champions that are immobilized , grounded , or slowed within 1000 range.
This bonus is doubled to 15% and does not have a range cap nor require vision toward enemy champions whose movement you impaired when they were visible . (note)

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Gain 7. 5 % bonus total movement speed while facing visible enemy champions that are immobilized , grounded , or slowed within 1000 range.
This bonus is doubled to 15% and does not have a range cap nor require vision toward enemy champions whose movement you impaired when they were visible . (note)

runes.name: Jack Of All Trades
runes.short_desc:
For each different stat gained from items, gain one Jack stack. Each stack grants you 1 Ability Haste.

Gain bonus Adaptive Force at 5 and 10 stacks.
runes.long_desc:
For each different stat gained from items, gain one Jack stack. Each stack grants you 1 Ability Haste.

Gain 10 or 25 bonus Adaptive Force at 5 and 10 stacks, respectively.
wiki_descriptions:
For each different stat gained from items, gain one Jack stack. Each stack grants you 1 Ability Haste.

Gain bonus Adaptive Force at 5 and 10 stacks.

For each different stat gained from items, gain one Jack stack. Each stack grants you 1 Ability Haste.

Gain 10 or 25 bonus Adaptive Force at 5 and 10 stacks, respectively.

effects_structured.raw:
For each different stat gained from items, gain one Jack stack. Each stack grants you 1 Ability Haste.

Gain bonus Adaptive Force at 5 and 10 stacks.

For each different stat gained from items, gain one Jack stack. Each stack grants you 1 Ability Haste.

Gain 10 or 25 bonus Adaptive Force at 5 and 10 stacks, respectively.

runes.name: Press the Attack
runes.short_desc: Hitting an enemy champion 3 consecutive times deals bonus damage and amplifies your damage until you leave combat with champions.
runes.long_desc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 consecutive basic attacks deals 40 - 160 bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> (based on level) and amplifies your damage dealt by 8% until you leave combat with champions.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications, expiring upon attacking a new champion, and stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes all stacks to deal 40 – 174. 12 (based on level) bonus adaptive damage and grant you 8% increased damage against champions until 5 seconds after exiting combat with them.

Adaptive Damage: This effect deals either physical or magic damage depending on the damage contribution from your attack damage and ability power to the effect's damage formula. Greater bonus damage from the AD ratio → Physical damage Greater bonus damage from the AP ratio → Magic damage If the damage contribution of AD and AP are zero or otherwise equal, the damage type depends on the effect's particular default.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Basic attacks on-hit against enemy champions apply a stack for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent applications, expiring upon attacking a new champion, and stacking up to 3 times. The third stack consumes all stacks to deal 40 – 174. 12 (based on level) bonus adaptive damage and grant you 8% increased damage against champions until 5 seconds after exiting combat with them.

Adaptive Damage: This effect deals either physical or magic damage depending on the damage contribution from your attack damage and ability power to the effect's damage formula. Greater bonus damage from the AD ratio → Physical damage Greater bonus damage from the AP ratio → Magic damage If the damage contribution of AD and AP are zero or otherwise equal, the damage type depends on the effect's particular default.

runes.name: Lethal Tempo
runes.short_desc: Attacking an enemy champion grants you Attack Speed, up to 6 stacks. At max stacks, deal <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'><font color='#48C4B7'>bonus adaptive damage</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> On-Attack.
runes.long_desc: Attacking an enemy champion grants you [6% Melee || 4% Ranged] Attack Speed for 6 seconds, up to 6. At max stacks, deal [9 - 30 Melee || 6 - 24 Ranged] <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>bonus adaptive damage On-Attack, increased by 1% per 1% Bonus Attack Speed</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Basic attacks on-attack against enemy champions grant a stack for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and stacking up to 6 times. Gain ( 6% / 4. 8 % ) bonus attack speed for each stack, up to ( 36% / 28. 8 % ) at maximum stacks.

At maximum stacks, basic attacks are empowered to fire a bolt at the target on-attack that deals them ( 9 – 32. 47 / 6 – 26. 12 ) (based on level) bonus adaptive damage upon arrival, increased by ( 1% / 0. 6 6 % ) per 1% bonus attack speed .
Stacks expire one by one every 0. 5 seconds when the duration ends.

Adaptive Damage: This effect deals either physical or magic damage depending on the damage contribution from your attack damage and ability power to the effect's damage formula. Greater bonus damage from the AD ratio → Physical damage Greater bonus damage from the AP ratio → Magic damage If the damage contribution of AD and AP are zero or otherwise equal, the damage type depends on the effect's particular default.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Basic attacks on-attack against enemy champions grant a stack for 6 seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and stacking up to 6 times. Gain ( 6% / 4. 8 % ) bonus attack speed for each stack, up to ( 36% / 28. 8 % ) at maximum stacks.

At maximum stacks, basic attacks are empowered to fire a bolt at the target on-attack that deals them ( 9 – 32. 47 / 6 – 26. 12 ) (based on level) bonus adaptive damage upon arrival, increased by ( 1% / 0. 6 6 % ) per 1% bonus attack speed .
Stacks expire one by one every 0. 5 seconds when the duration ends.

Adaptive Damage: This effect deals either physical or magic damage depending on the damage contribution from your attack damage and ability power to the effect's damage formula. Greater bonus damage from the AD ratio → Physical damage Greater bonus damage from the AP ratio → Magic damage If the damage contribution of AD and AP are zero or otherwise equal, the damage type depends on the effect's particular default.

runes.name: Fleet Footwork
runes.short_desc: Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack heals you and grants increased <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.long_desc:
Attacking and moving builds Energy stacks. At 100 stacks, your next attack is Energized

Energized attacks heal you for 10 - 130 (+0.1 Bonus AD, +0.05 AP) and grant 20% Move Speed for 1s.

For Ranged Champions, Healing is 60% effective and Move Speed is 75% effective. All healing is 15% effective against Minions.
wiki_descriptions: Unique – Energized : Moving and basic attacking generates Charges , up to 100.

At 100 Charges , become Energized , empowering your next basic attack to heal you for ( 10 – 148. 81 / 6 – 89. 29 ) (based on level) (+ ( 10% / 6% ) bonus AD) (+ ( 5% / 3% ) AP) and grant ( 20% / 15% ) bonus movement speed for 1 second. Against minions , the healing is 15% effective.

effects_structured.raw: Unique – Energized : Moving and basic attacking generates Charges , up to 100.

At 100 Charges , become Energized , empowering your next basic attack to heal you for ( 10 – 148. 81 / 6 – 89. 29 ) (based on level) (+ ( 10% / 6% ) bonus AD) (+ ( 5% / 3% ) AP) and grant ( 20% / 15% ) bonus movement speed for 1 second. Against minions , the healing is 15% effective.

runes.name: Conqueror
runes.short_desc: Gain stacks of adaptive force when attacking enemy champions. After reaching 12 stacks, heal for a portion of damage you deal to champions.
runes.long_desc:
Basic attacks or spells that deal damage to an enemy champion grant 2 stacks of Conqueror for 5s, gaining 1.8-4 Adaptive Force per stack. Stacks up to 12 times. Ranged champions gain only 1 stack per basic attack.

When fully stacked, heal for 8% of the damage you deal to champions (5% for ranged champions).
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Dealing damage to enemy champions grants stacks of Conqueror , lasting for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent damage against champions, and stacking up to 12 times. Gain ( 2 / 1 ) stacks on-hit , and 2 stacks from ability damage or non- basic damage , prioritizing the latter.

Each stack of Conqueror grants 1. 08 – 2. 56 (based on level) bonus Attack Damage or 1. 8 – 4. 26 (based on level) Ability Power ( Adaptive ), up to 12. 96 – 30. 66 (based on level) bonus Attack Damage or 21. 6 – 51. 11 (based on level) Ability Power ( Adaptive ) at maximum stacks, at which you also heal for ( 8% / 5% ) of the post-mitigation damage dealt against enemy champions.
Each cast instance can only grant stacks once every 4 seconds. Proc damage from non- pets ; and basic damage that does not apply on-hits , will not grant any stacks.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Dealing damage to enemy champions grants stacks of Conqueror , lasting for 5 seconds, refreshing on subsequent damage against champions, and stacking up to 12 times. Gain ( 2 / 1 ) stacks on-hit , and 2 stacks from ability damage or non- basic damage , prioritizing the latter.

Each stack of Conqueror grants 1. 08 – 2. 56 (based on level) bonus Attack Damage or 1. 8 – 4. 26 (based on level) Ability Power ( Adaptive ), up to 12. 96 – 30. 66 (based on level) bonus Attack Damage or 21. 6 – 51. 11 (based on level) Ability Power ( Adaptive ) at maximum stacks, at which you also heal for ( 8% / 5% ) of the post-mitigation damage dealt against enemy champions.
Each cast instance can only grant stacks once every 4 seconds. Proc damage from non- pets ; and basic damage that does not apply on-hits , will not grant any stacks.

runes.name: Absorb Life
runes.short_desc: Killing a target heals you.
runes.long_desc: Killing a target heals you for @HealAmount@.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Killing an enemy heals you for 1 – 27 (based on level) .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Killing an enemy heals you for 1 – 27 (based on level) .

runes.name: Triumph
runes.short_desc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Takedown'>Takedowns</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> restore 5% of your missing health and grant an additional 20 gold.
runes.long_desc:
Takedowns restore 5% of your missing health, 2.5% of your max health, and grant an additional 20 gold.


'The most dangerous game brings the greatest glory.'
—Noxian Reckoner
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion heals you for 2. 5 % of your maximum health (+ 5% of your missing health) and grants you an additional 20 , both after a 1-second delay.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion heals you for 2. 5 % of your maximum health (+ 5% of your missing health) and grants you an additional 20 , both after a 1-second delay.

runes.name: Presence of Mind
runes.short_desc: Restore a small amount of mana or energy when damaging an enemy champion. Takedowns restore mana or energy.
runes.long_desc:
Damaging an enemy champion restores 6-50 (80% for ranged) mana or 6 energy.

Takedowns restore 15% of your maximum mana or energy.

Cooldown for damage restoration: 8s
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion restores 15% of your maximum mana or 15% of your maximum energy after a 1-second delay.
Damaging an enemy champion restores ( 6 – 56 / 4. 8 – 44. 8 ) (based on level) mana or 6 energy (8 second cooldown).

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion restores 15% of your maximum mana or 15% of your maximum energy after a 1-second delay.
Damaging an enemy champion restores ( 6 – 56 / 4. 8 – 44. 8 ) (based on level) mana or 6 energy (8 second cooldown).

runes.name: Legend: Alacrity
runes.short_desc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Attack Speed.
runes.long_desc:
Gain 3% attack speed plus an additional 1.5% for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain 3% (+ 1. 5 % per Legend stack ) bonus attack speed , up to 18% at maximum stacks.
Legend: Gain Legend stacks for every 100 points earned, up to 10: 100 points for champion takedowns 100 points for epic monster takedowns 25 points for large monster kills 4 points for minion kills

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Gain 3% (+ 1. 5 % per Legend stack ) bonus attack speed , up to 18% at maximum stacks.
Legend: Gain Legend stacks for every 100 points earned, up to 10: 100 points for champion takedowns 100 points for epic monster takedowns 25 points for large monster kills 4 points for minion kills

runes.name: Legend: Haste
runes.short_desc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Basic Ability Haste.
runes.long_desc:
Gain 1.5 basic ability haste for every Legend stack (max 10 stacks).

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain 1. 5 basic ability haste per Legend stack , up to 15 at maximum stacks.
Legend: Gain Legend stacks for every 100 points earned, up to 10: 100 points for champion takedowns 100 points for epic monster takedowns 25 points for large monster kills 4 points for minion kills

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Gain 1. 5 basic ability haste per Legend stack , up to 15 at maximum stacks.
Legend: Gain Legend stacks for every 100 points earned, up to 10: 100 points for champion takedowns 100 points for epic monster takedowns 25 points for large monster kills 4 points for minion kills

runes.name: Legend: Bloodline
runes.short_desc: Takedowns on enemies grant permanent Life Steal, up to a cap. Once the cap is reached, increase your max health. Weaker earlier but stronger later game than other Legend Runes.
runes.long_desc:
Gain 0.45% Life Steal for every Legend stack (max 15 stacks). At maximum Legend stacks, gain 85 max health.

Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, large monster kill, and minion kill.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain 0. 45 % life steal per Legend stack , up to 6. 75 % at maximum stacks, at which you also gain 85 bonus health .
Legend: Gain Legend stacks for every 100 points earned, up to 15: 100 points for champion takedowns 100 points for epic monster takedowns 25 points for large monster kills 4 points for minion kills

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Gain 0. 45 % life steal per Legend stack , up to 6. 75 % at maximum stacks, at which you also gain 85 bonus health .
Legend: Gain Legend stacks for every 100 points earned, up to 15: 100 points for champion takedowns 100 points for epic monster takedowns 25 points for large monster kills 4 points for minion kills

runes.name: Coup de Grace
runes.short_desc: Deal more damage to low health enemy champions.
runes.long_desc: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have less than 40% health.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Deal 8% increased damage to champions below 40% maximum health .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Deal 8% increased damage to champions below 40% maximum health .

runes.name: Cut Down
runes.short_desc: Deal more damage to high health enemy champions.
runes.long_desc: Deal 8% more damage to champions who have more than 60% health.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Deal 8% increased damage to champions above 60% maximum health .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Deal 8% increased damage to champions above 60% maximum health .

runes.name: Last Stand
runes.short_desc: Deal more damage to champions while you are low on health.
runes.long_desc: Deal 5% - 11% increased damage to champions while you are below 60% health. Max damage gained at 30% health.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Deal 5% increased damage to champions while below 60% maximum health . This increases further based on your missing health , up to 11% increased damage while below 30% maximum health .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Deal 5% increased damage to champions while below 60% maximum health . This increases further based on your missing health , up to 11% increased damage while below 30% maximum health .

runes.name: Grasp of the Undying
runes.short_desc: Every 4s your next attack on a champion deals bonus magic damage, heals you, and permanently increases your health.
runes.long_desc:
Every 4s in combat, your next basic attack on a champion will:
  • Deal bonus magic damage equal to 3.5% of your max health
  • Heal you for 1.3% of your max health
  • Permanently increase your health by 5
    Ranged Champions: Damage, healing, and permanent health gained are 40% effective.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Entering combat generates 1 stack every second for the next 3 seconds, refreshing the duration with each instance of combat and stacking the effect up to 4 times. At maximum stacks, your next basic attack on-hit within 5 seconds against an enemy champion consumes all stacks to deal bonus magic damage equal to ( 3. 5 % / 1. 4 % ) of your maximum health , heal you for (+ ( 1. 3 % / 0. 52 % ) of your maximum health) , and permanently grant you ( 5 / 2 ) bonus health .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Entering combat generates 1 stack every second for the next 3 seconds, refreshing the duration with each instance of combat and stacking the effect up to 4 times. At maximum stacks, your next basic attack on-hit within 5 seconds against an enemy champion consumes all stacks to deal bonus magic damage equal to ( 3. 5 % / 1. 4 % ) of your maximum health , heal you for (+ ( 1. 3 % / 0. 52 % ) of your maximum health) , and permanently grant you ( 5 / 2 ) bonus health .

runes.template_source: Template:Rune data Grasp of the Undying

runes.name: Aftershock
runes.short_desc: After <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Immobilize'>immobilizing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> an enemy champion gain defenses and later deal a burst of magic damage around you.
runes.long_desc:
After immobilizing an enemy champion, increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 35 + 80% of your Bonus Resists for 2.5s. Then explode, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

Damage: 25 - 120 (+8% of your bonus health)
Cooldown: 20s

Resistance bonus from Aftershock capped at: 80-150 (based on level)
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Immobilizing an enemy champion grants you a static 35 (+ 80% bonus armor) bonus armor and 35 (+ 80% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance for 2. 5 seconds. The bonus resistances are each capped at 80 – 150 (based on level) .
After the duration, you release a shockwave that deals 25 – 120 (based on level) (+ 8% of your bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions and monsters within a 350 radius.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Immobilizing an enemy champion grants you a static 35 (+ 80% bonus armor) bonus armor and 35 (+ 80% bonus magic resistance) bonus magic resistance for 2. 5 seconds. The bonus resistances are each capped at 80 – 150 (based on level) .
After the duration, you release a shockwave that deals 25 – 120 (based on level) (+ 8% of your bonus health) magic damage to enemy champions and monsters within a 350 radius.

runes.name: Guardian
runes.short_desc: Guard allies you cast spells on and those that are very nearby. If you or a guarded ally would take damage based on level, you're both granted a shield.
runes.long_desc:
Guard allies within 350 units of you, and allies you target with spells for 2.5s. While Guarding, if you or the ally take more than a small amount of damage over the duration of the Guard, both of you gain a shield for 1.5s.

Cooldown: 90 - 40 seconds
Shield: 45 - 180 + 25% of your ability power + 5% of your bonus health
Proc Threshold: 50 - 165 postmitigation damage
wiki_descriptions: Passive: While within 350 units of an allied champion , you raise your Guard . Allied champions you affect with unit-targeted abilities are also Guarded for 3 seconds, regardless of distance.

If you or a Guarded ally would take 50 – 165 (based on level) damage within 2. 5 seconds or lethal damage from an enemy champion, monster or turret , you both gain a shield for 45 – 180 (based on level) (+ 25% of your AP) (+ 5% of your bonus health) for 2 seconds.
Guardian only goes on cooldown when the shield is triggered.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: While within 350 units of an allied champion , you raise your Guard . Allied champions you affect with unit-targeted abilities are also Guarded for 3 seconds, regardless of distance.

If you or a Guarded ally would take 50 – 165 (based on level) damage within 2. 5 seconds or lethal damage from an enemy champion, monster or turret , you both gain a shield for 45 – 180 (based on level) (+ 25% of your AP) (+ 5% of your bonus health) for 2 seconds.
Guardian only goes on cooldown when the shield is triggered.

runes.name: Demolish
runes.short_desc: Your third attack against turrets deals bonus damage.
runes.long_desc:
Your third attack against towers deals [85 (+28% max Health) Melee || 50 (+20% max Health) Ranged] bonus physical damage.

Cooldown: 30s
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Basic attacks against turrets apply a stack of Demolish , stacking up to 3 times. The third stack against a turret consumes them all to deal ( 85 / 50 ) (+ ( 28% / 20% ) of your maximum health) bonus physical damage .
Demolish cannot be triggered on the same turret by any of its users more than once every 3 seconds.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Basic attacks against turrets apply a stack of Demolish , stacking up to 3 times. The third stack against a turret consumes them all to deal ( 85 / 50 ) (+ ( 28% / 20% ) of your maximum health) bonus physical damage .
Demolish cannot be triggered on the same turret by any of its users more than once every 3 seconds.

runes.name: Font of Life
runes.short_desc: <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_ImpairMov'>Impairing</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> the movement of an enemy champion heals nearby allied champions.
runes.long_desc:
Impairing the movement of an enemy champion restores @BaseHeal@ Health to you and the lowest health nearby allied champion.

70% effect for Ranged Users.

Cooldown: 20s
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Slowing or immobilizing an enemy champion heals you and the nearest and most wounded allied champion within 1000 units for ( 10 – 54. 71 / 7 – 38. 29 ) (based on your level).

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Slowing or immobilizing an enemy champion heals you and the nearest and most wounded allied champion within 1000 units for ( 10 – 54. 71 / 7 – 38. 29 ) (based on your level).

runes.name: Shield Bash
runes.short_desc: Whenever you gain a shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals bonus <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'><font color='#48C4B7'>adaptive</font></lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> damage.
runes.long_desc:
Whenever you gain a new shield, your next basic attack against a champion deals 5 - 30 (+2.5% Bonus Health) (+15.0% New Shield Amount) bonus adaptive damage.

You have up to 2s after the shield expires to use this effect.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Whenever you gain a shield , your next basic attack against an enemy champion is empowered to deal 5 – 32. 94 (based on level) (+ 2. 5 % bonus health) (+ 15% shield amount) bonus adaptive damage . The empowered attack lasts for up to 2 seconds after the shield expires.

Adaptive Damage: This effect deals either physical or magic damage depending on the damage contribution from your attack damage and ability power to the effect's damage formula. Greater bonus damage from the AD ratio → Physical damage Greater bonus damage from the AP ratio → Magic damage If the damage contribution of AD and AP are zero or otherwise equal, the damage type depends on the effect's particular default.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Whenever you gain a shield , your next basic attack against an enemy champion is empowered to deal 5 – 32. 94 (based on level) (+ 2. 5 % bonus health) (+ 15% shield amount) bonus adaptive damage . The empowered attack lasts for up to 2 seconds after the shield expires.

Adaptive Damage: This effect deals either physical or magic damage depending on the damage contribution from your attack damage and ability power to the effect's damage formula. Greater bonus damage from the AD ratio → Physical damage Greater bonus damage from the AP ratio → Magic damage If the damage contribution of AD and AP are zero or otherwise equal, the damage type depends on the effect's particular default.

runes.name: Conditioning
runes.short_desc: After 12 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 3%.
runes.long_desc: After 12 min gain +8 Armor and +8 Magic Resist and increase your Armor and Magic Resist by 3%.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: After 12 minutes, gain 8 bonus armor and 8 bonus magic resistance and your total armor and total magic resistance are increased by 3%.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: After 12 minutes, gain 8 bonus armor and 8 bonus magic resistance and your total armor and total magic resistance are increased by 3%.

runes.name: Second Wind
runes.short_desc: After taking damage from an enemy champion heal back some missing health over time.
runes.long_desc: After taking damage from an enemy champion, heal for 4% of your missing health over 10s.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: After taking damage from an enemy champion , regenerate 4% of your missing health over 10 seconds, refreshing on subsequent damage.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: After taking damage from an enemy champion , regenerate 4% of your missing health over 10 seconds, refreshing on subsequent damage.

runes.name: Bone Plating
runes.short_desc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 (based on level) less damage.

Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 55s
runes.long_desc:
After taking damage from an enemy champion, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from them deal 30-60 (based on level) less damage.

Duration: 1.5s
Cooldown: 55s
wiki_descriptions: Passive: After taking damage from an enemy champion , activate Bone Plating for 1. 5 seconds. While active, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from the enemy champion that triggered this effect deal 30 – 63. 53 (based on level) less damage (including true damage ).

effects_structured.raw: Passive: After taking damage from an enemy champion , activate Bone Plating for 1. 5 seconds. While active, the next 3 spells or attacks you receive from the enemy champion that triggered this effect deal 30 – 63. 53 (based on level) less damage (including true damage ).

runes.name: Overgrowth
runes.short_desc: Gain permanent max health when minions or monsters die near you.
runes.long_desc:
Absorb life essence from monsters or enemy minions that die near you, permanently gaining 3 maximum health for every 8.

When you've absorbed 120 monsters or enemy minions, gain an additional 3.5% maximum health.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Every 8 monsters or enemy minions that die near you permanently generates a stack . Each stack grants 3 bonus health . This effect can stack indefinitely.
After reaching 15 stacks (120 monsters or minions), your base and bonus health are permanently increased by 3. 5 %.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Every 8 monsters or enemy minions that die near you permanently generates a stack . Each stack grants 3 bonus health . This effect can stack indefinitely.
After reaching 15 stacks (120 monsters or minions), your base and bonus health are permanently increased by 3. 5 %.

runes.name: Revitalize
runes.short_desc:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.
runes.long_desc:
Gain 5% Heal and Shield Power.

Heals and shields you cast or receive are 10% stronger on targets below 40% health.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Grants 5% Heal and shield power .
Outgoing healing and outgoing shielding are increased by 10% on targets below 40% of their maximum health .
Incoming healing, incoming shielding, self-healing and self-shielding are increased by 10% while you are below 40% of your maximum health .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Grants 5% Heal and shield power .
Outgoing healing and outgoing shielding are increased by 10% on targets below 40% of their maximum health .
Incoming healing, incoming shielding, self-healing and self-shielding are increased by 10% while you are below 40% of your maximum health .

runes.name: Unflinching
runes.short_desc: Gain Armor and Magic Resist when receiving crowd control.
runes.long_desc: Gain 10 Armor and Magic Resist when crowd controlled and for 2 seconds after.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: While afflicted with crowd control sourced from enemy champions , gain 10 bonus armor and 10 bonus magic resistance , lingering for 2 seconds after the impairment ends.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: While afflicted with crowd control sourced from enemy champions , gain 10 bonus armor and 10 bonus magic resistance , lingering for 2 seconds after the impairment ends.

runes.name: Summon Aery
runes.short_desc: Your attacks and abilities send Aery to a target, damaging enemies or shielding allies.
runes.long_desc:
Damaging enemy champions with basic attacks or abilities sends Aery to them, dealing 10 - 50 based on level (+0.05 AP) (+0.1 bonus AD).

Empowering or protecting allies with abilities sends Aery to them, shielding them for 30 - 100 based on level (+0.05 AP) (+0.1 bonus AD).

Aery cannot be sent out again until she returns to you.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Damaging basic attacks , abilities , and item effects against an enemy champion signal Aery to pounce at them over 0. 45 seconds, dealing 10 – 54. 71 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) physical or magic damage. Healing , shielding , or buffing an allied champion signals Aery to leap to their side over 0. 35 seconds, shielding them for 30 – 108. 24 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) for 2 seconds.

Aery applies her effects to the affected champion upon arrival. She then lingers on the target for 2 seconds before flying back to the user, and cannot be sent out again until she returns. While on her way back, she is initially very slow , but gradually accelerates , and can be picked up by moving near her .
If 「 10% bonus AD ≥ 5% AP , 」 「 bonus AD ≥ 50% AP , 」 deals physical damage . If otherwise, deals magic damage .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Damaging basic attacks , abilities , and item effects against an enemy champion signal Aery to pounce at them over 0. 45 seconds, dealing 10 – 54. 71 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) physical or magic damage. Healing , shielding , or buffing an allied champion signals Aery to leap to their side over 0. 35 seconds, shielding them for 30 – 108. 24 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) for 2 seconds.

Aery applies her effects to the affected champion upon arrival. She then lingers on the target for 2 seconds before flying back to the user, and cannot be sent out again until she returns. While on her way back, she is initially very slow , but gradually accelerates , and can be picked up by moving near her .
If 「 10% bonus AD ≥ 5% AP , 」 「 bonus AD ≥ 50% AP , 」 deals physical damage . If otherwise, deals magic damage .

runes.name: Arcane Comet
runes.short_desc: Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a damaging comet at their location.
runes.long_desc:
Damaging a champion with an ability hurls a comet at their location, or, if Arcane Comet is on cooldown, reduces its remaining cooldown.

Adaptive Damage: 30 - 130 based on level (+0.05 AP and +0.1 bonus AD)
Cooldown: 20 - 8s

Cooldown Reduction:
Single Target: 20%.
Area of Effect: 10%.
Damage over Time: 5%.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Dealing non-0 ability damage to an enemy champion hurls an Arcane Comet at their current location that lands after 0. 825 seconds , dealing 30 – 141. 76 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) physical or magic damage to enemies within a 140 radius upon impact.
Dealing forms of ability damage reduces the remaining cooldown. Spell damage : 20% Area damage : 10% per enemy hit Persistent damage : 5%
If 「 10% bonus AD ≥ 5% AP , 」 「 bonus AD ≥ 50% AP , 」 deals physical damage . If otherwise, deals magic damage .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Dealing non-0 ability damage to an enemy champion hurls an Arcane Comet at their current location that lands after 0. 825 seconds , dealing 30 – 141. 76 (based on level) (+ 10% bonus AD) (+ 5% AP) physical or magic damage to enemies within a 140 radius upon impact.
Dealing forms of ability damage reduces the remaining cooldown. Spell damage : 20% Area damage : 10% per enemy hit Persistent damage : 5%
If 「 10% bonus AD ≥ 5% AP , 」 「 bonus AD ≥ 50% AP , 」 deals physical damage . If otherwise, deals magic damage .

runes.name: Phase Rush
runes.short_desc: Hitting an enemy champion with 3 separate attacks or abilities grants a burst of MS and Slow Resist.
runes.long_desc:
Hitting an enemy champion with 3 attacks or separate abilities within 4s grants 25 - 50% Move Speed based on level and 50% Slow Resistance for 3s. Move Speed is 50% effective for ranged champions.
Cooldown: 30s - 10s
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Damaging basic attacks , abilities , item effects , and summoner spells , as well as the application of crowd control and damage over time effects, generate stacks against enemy champions , up to one per attack or cast per champion. Applying 3 stacks to a target within a 4 second period grants you ( 25% – 52. 94 % / 12. 5 % – 26. 47 % ) (based on level) bonus movement speed and 50% slow resist for 3 seconds.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Damaging basic attacks , abilities , item effects , and summoner spells , as well as the application of crowd control and damage over time effects, generate stacks against enemy champions , up to one per attack or cast per champion. Applying 3 stacks to a target within a 4 second period grants you ( 25% – 52. 94 % / 12. 5 % – 26. 47 % ) (based on level) bonus movement speed and 50% slow resist for 3 seconds.

runes.name: Axiom Arcanist
runes.short_desc: Your Ultimate has increased damage, healing, and shielding. Scoring a takedown on an enemy champion reduces your Ultimate's current cooldown.
runes.long_desc:
Your Ultimate has 12% increased damage, healing, and shielding.
(AoE damage is reduced to a 8% increase)

Scoring a takedown on an enemy champion reduces your Ultimate's current cooldown by 7%.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Your ultimate has 12% increased damage (reduced to 8% for area of effect abilities), healing and shielding .
Scoring an enemy champion takedown reduces your ultimate ability's current cooldown by 7%.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Your ultimate has 12% increased damage (reduced to 8% for area of effect abilities), healing and shielding .
Scoring an enemy champion takedown reduces your ultimate ability's current cooldown by 7%.

runes.name: Manaflow Band
runes.short_desc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.
runes.long_desc:
Hitting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25, up to 250 mana.

After reaching 250 bonus mana, restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

Cooldown: 15 seconds
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Affecting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25 , up to 250 mana . Mana gained from this effect preserves your current mana .
After reaching 250 bonus mana , permanently restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Affecting an enemy champion with an ability permanently increases your maximum mana by 25 , up to 250 mana . Mana gained from this effect preserves your current mana .
After reaching 250 bonus mana , permanently restore 1% of your missing mana every 5 seconds.

runes.name: Nimbus Cloak
runes.short_desc: After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a short <speed>Move Speed</speed> increase that allows you to pass through units.
runes.long_desc:
After casting a Summoner Spell, gain a Move Speed increase that lasts for 2s and allows you to pass through units.

Increase: 15% - 45% Move Speed based on the Summoner Spell's cooldown. (Higher cooldown Summoner Spells grant more Move Speed).
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Using a summoner spell grants ghosting and 15% – 45% (based on summoner spell cooldown) bonus movement speed decaying over 2 seconds.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Using a summoner spell grants ghosting and 15% – 45% (based on summoner spell cooldown) bonus movement speed decaying over 2 seconds.

runes.name: Transcendence
runes.short_desc:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
runes.long_desc:
Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels:
Level 5: +5 Ability Haste
Level 8: +5 Ability Haste
Level 11: On Champion takedown, reduce the remaining cooldown of basic abilities by 20%.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels: Level 5: + 5 ability haste . Level 8: + 5 ability haste . Level 11: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion reduces the current cooldowns of your basic abilities by 20%.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Gain bonuses upon reaching the following levels: Level 5: + 5 ability haste . Level 8: + 5 ability haste . Level 11: Scoring a takedown against an enemy champion reduces the current cooldowns of your basic abilities by 20%.

runes.name: Celerity
runes.short_desc: All <speed>Move Speed</speed> bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
runes.long_desc: All movement bonuses are 7% more effective on you and gain <speed>1% Move Speed</speed>.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: All movement speed bonuses increase in effectiveness by 7%.
Additionally, you gain 1% bonus movement speed .

effects_structured.raw: Passive: All movement speed bonuses increase in effectiveness by 7%.
Additionally, you gain 1% bonus movement speed .

runes.name: Absolute Focus
runes.short_desc: While above 70% health, gain extra <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_AdaptiveDmg'>adaptive damage</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword>.
runes.long_desc:
While above 70% health, gain an adaptive bonus of up to 18 Attack Damage or 30 Ability Power (based on level).

Grants 1.8 Attack Damage or 3 Ability Power at level 1.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain 1. 8 – 19. 91 (based on level) bonus Attack Damage or 3 – 33. 18 (based on level) Ability Power ( Adaptive ) while above 70% of your maximum health .
Adaptive: Grants bonuses based on which stat you already have the most bonuses for. Defaults to the first listed.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Gain 1. 8 – 19. 91 (based on level) bonus Attack Damage or 3 – 33. 18 (based on level) Ability Power ( Adaptive ) while above 70% of your maximum health .
Adaptive: Grants bonuses based on which stat you already have the most bonuses for. Defaults to the first listed.

runes.name: Scorch
runes.short_desc: Your first damaging ability hit every 10s burns champions.
runes.long_desc:
Your next damaging ability hit sets champions on fire dealing 20 - 40 bonus magic damage based on level after 1s.

Cooldown: 10s
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Dealing ability damage to an enemy champion sets them on fire, dealing them 20 – 42. 35 (based on level) bonus magic damage after 1 second.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Dealing ability damage to an enemy champion sets them on fire, dealing them 20 – 42. 35 (based on level) bonus magic damage after 1 second.

runes.name: Waterwalking
runes.short_desc: Gain <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_MS'>MS</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> and AP or AD, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> in the river.
runes.long_desc:
Gain 10 Move Speed and 13 - 30 Adaptive Force (based on level) when in the river.

May you be as swift as the rushing river and agile as a startled Rift Scuttler.
wiki_descriptions: Passive: While in the river , you gain 10 bonus movement speed and 7. 8 – 19. 2 (based on level) bonus Attack Damage or 13 – 32 (based on level) Ability Power ( Adaptive ).
Adaptive: Grants bonuses based on which stat you already have the most bonuses for. Defaults to the first listed.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: While in the river , you gain 10 bonus movement speed and 7. 8 – 19. 2 (based on level) bonus Attack Damage or 13 – 32 (based on level) Ability Power ( Adaptive ).
Adaptive: Grants bonuses based on which stat you already have the most bonuses for. Defaults to the first listed.

runes.name: Gathering Storm
runes.short_desc: Gain increasing amounts of AD or AP, <lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword key='LinkTooltip_Description_Adaptive'>adaptive</lol-uikit-tooltipped-keyword> over the course of the game.
runes.long_desc:
Every 10 min gain AP or AD, adaptive.

10 min: + 8 AP or 5 AD
20 min: + 24 AP or 14 AD
30 min: + 48 AP or 29 AD
40 min: + 80 AP or 48 AD
50 min: + 120 AP or 72 AD
60 min: + 168 AP or 101 AD
etc...
wiki_descriptions: Passive: Gain increasing adaptive Force every 10 minutes that grants a total of 0 / 4. 8 / 14. 4 / 28. 8 / 48 / 72 / 100. 8 / 134. 4 / ∞ (based on minutes) bonus Attack Damage or 0 / 8 / 24 / 48 / 80 / 120 / 168 / 224 / ∞ (based on minutes) Ability Power .
Adaptive: Grants bonuses based on which stat you already have the most bonuses for. Defaults to the first listed.

effects_structured.raw: Passive: Gain increasing adaptive Force every 10 minutes that grants a total of 0 / 4. 8 / 14. 4 / 28. 8 / 48 / 72 / 100. 8 / 134. 4 / ∞ (based on minutes) bonus Attack Damage or 0 / 8 / 24 / 48 / 80 / 120 / 168 / 224 / ∞ (based on minutes) Ability Power .
Adaptive: Grants bonuses based on which stat you already have the most bonuses for. Defaults to the first listed.

schema_notes.effects_structured: Best-effort numeric parsing with canonical stat keys. Use raw text for exact wording.
schema_notes.wiki_templates: Descriptions sourced from Template:Rune data <Rune Name> when available.
schema_notes.stat_shards_source: Parsed from LoL Wiki Rune shards table.
schema_notes.terminology: In modern LoL, 'masteries' refers to the Runes Reforged system; treat these as equivalent names.
schema_notes.formula: formula provides normalized calculation forms (flat, range, per_rank) with units where possible.
schema_notes.conditions: conditions list indicates common conditional phrases parsed from rune descriptions.
schema_notes.parse_confidence: parse_confidence is heuristic; use raw text for exact meaning if low.

sources.name: Data Dragon runesReforged.json
used_for: rune paths, rune ids, icons, and slot structure
